description.value:
Forging techniques vary widely by region, and the most powerful techniques are tightly bound in both blood and mystery. Chose one discipline of the forge from the options below.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.class-features.Item.x7FOnyRAo5ENYS8g]{Boundless Sky}

rules.prompt: Select a discipline of the forge
